author: Reuters Editorial
title: B. Riley Financial Announces Pricing Of Senior Notes Offering
text:
B. Riley Financial Inc:
* B. RILEY FINANCIAL ANNOUNCES PRICING OF SENIOR NOTES OFFERING
* B. RILEY FINANCIAL INC - PRICED UNDERWRITTEN REGISTERED PUBLIC OFFERING OF $87 MILLION OF 7.375% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023 AT 100% OF PRINCIPAL AMOUNT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
